message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.CE, cs.DB

This paper is primarily focused on the design and implementation of a machine learning platform for digital advertising technology. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper discusses the processing of large amounts of data, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) or cs.DB (Databases). The use of machine learning for advertising campaigns also implies a focus on information retrieval, which could place the paper in cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper discusses the impact of the machine learning platform on advertising campaigns, which suggests a focus on computational economics, placing it in cs.CE (Computational Economics).
